stepAnswer: if you'd like a new row or column adjacent to an existing row or column
stepTitle: Why would you need to insert a row or column into your spreadsheet?
choices: If you want to clear the contents of a row or column
If you want to hide an existing row or column from your spreadsheet
If you want to remove or revise the data in your spreadsheet
If you'd like a new row or column adjacent to an existing row or column
if you'd like a new row or column adjacent to an existing row or column
